title: Matthew Townsend on President Trump (Audio)
itunes:title: Matthew Townsend on President Trump (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. (Carol Solo) \u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Matthew Townsend\u0010Reporter\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Will discuss his story on how some Executives have distanced themselves from President Trump.
